For the people who don't know how to play MKV files, just download the cracked version of AVS video converter and convert it to an AVI file.

Why make things complicated?
Just use vlc for matroska. Vlc can be used for almost everything, I've never had a file I couldn't play.

Just Download VLC Media Player : http://www.videolan.org/vlc/

It works with everything including rms
